Class StaffMessagesTest

java.lang.Object
database.BaseDatabaseTest
database.tests.StaffMessagesTest
@TestMethodOrder(org.junit.jupiter.api.MethodOrderer.OrderAnnotation.class) public class StaffMessagesTest extends BaseDatabaseTest
Unit tests for the StaffMessages repository.

This test class verifies the functionality of operations performed on the "StaffMessages" table, including sending messages, loading chat histories, retrieving unique chat partners, and deletion. It covers various scenarios with multiple users and staff members.

See Also:
